item.title: Database
item.description: Comprehensive Databases and Models USGS Data National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC): Data and Products NGDC and its sister data centers are merged into the NCEI National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI): Data EarthByte Data and Model EFEHR Services IRIS EMC: IRIS Earth Model Collaboration | Web service Reference Earth models Earth models Visualization tools Earth Models: a platform to store and exchange modeling tools
